snippet: Police officials say a dispute over a delayed marriage led the man to kill his uncle, aunt, four male cousins and four female cousins, including the woman he wanted to marry,
abstract: Pakistani man Gul Ahmed Said kills 10 relatives in Islamabad over family dispute regarding his marriage plans; Said had been a fugitive for five months after killing his own parents over their insistence on delaying his marriage for financial reasons.
lead_paragraph: Police officials say a dispute over a delayed marriage led the man to kill his uncle, aunt, four male cousins and four female cousins, including the woman he wanted to marry,

headline.main: Pakistani Man Killed 10 Relatives, Police Say
